title: Fix RootNodeInfo object graph
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
The object graph for ConnectionInfo-style objects is hard to work with due to everything inheriting from AbstractConnectionInfoData.

RootNodeInfo objects do not need any of the properties from AbstractConnectionInfoData, only the methods from ContainerInfo (which inherits from ConnectionInfo).

Because of this oversimplification, differentiating between RootNodeInfos and ConnectionInfos is a bit convoluted.

**Purpose of proposed changes:**
Remove `RootNodeInfo` from the `ConnectionInfo` object graph.
